Entitlement based on care of children
SOURCE: Social Security Administration, Master Beneficiary Record, 100 percent data.
Total: NOTES: Because of differences in data sources and calculation methods, statistics reported in this table may differ from those reported by the Office of the Chief Actuary.
Male: Effective 2006, age is based on date of entitlement and not date of award. Entitlement can be retroactive and thus precede the date of award.
Female: a. Benefits awarded before the December cost-of-living increase are converted to the December rates before averages are computed.
Number: b. Includes conversions from nondisabled widow(er)'s benefits to higher retired-worker benefits.
